name: Off Road Dubai Drifting
description:
Now play 3D Off-Road Dubai Drifting and become a master in Cars drifting.You found a great place for drifting. Now start your engine and push the throttle very hard on the asphalt.
Your car is very powerful and tuned for drifting.
You are going to win if you can pass your previous records. Your competitor is a ghost car and driver is you. You are going to race against you.
Driving a car on the asphalt was never been such an exciting!
This is the best chance of you to improve your driving skills.
you have minimun time to complete track.
This car racing game will make an addiction to you.
TIPS: Drifting and cracking crates will let you earn more scores.
So what are you waiting for? Get ready for the Off-Road Dubai Drifting!
